errors.errorMessage: Resource with id [BadCodeUriTypeFunction] is invalid. 'CodeUri' requires Bucket and Key properties to be specified.
Resource with id [ExternalS3Function] is invalid. Event with id [S3Event] is invalid. S3 events must reference an S3 bucket in the same template.
Resource with id [BadCodeUriFunction] is invalid. 'CodeUri' is not a valid S3 Uri of the form "s3://bucket/key" with optional versionId query parameter.
Resource with id [BadDefinitionUriApi] is invalid. 'DefinitionUri' is not a valid S3 Uri of the form "s3://bucket/key" with optional versionId query parameter.
Resource with id [BadDefinitionUriTypeApi] is invalid. 'DefinitionUri' requires Bucket and Key properties to be specified.

errorMessage: Invalid Serverless Application Specification document. Number of errors found: 5. Resource with id [BadCodeUriFunction] is invalid. 'CodeUri' is not a valid S3 Uri of the form 's3://bucket/key' with optional versionId query parameter. Resource with id [BadCodeUriTypeFunction] is invalid. 'CodeUri' requires Bucket and Key properties to be specified. Resource with id [BadDefinitionUriApi] is invalid. 'DefinitionUri' is not a valid S3 Uri of the form 's3://bucket/key' with optional versionId query parameter. Resource with id [BadDefinitionUriTypeApi] is invalid. 'DefinitionUri' requires Bucket and Key properties to be specified. Resource with id [ExternalS3Function] is invalid. Event with id [S3Event] is invalid. S3 events must reference an S3 bucket in the same template.
